pages.text: While many structures are called dungeons, this one is the original. It is also known as monster room. Like most other structures, it comes in many different biome-specific variants. It always generates with a connection to a cave.

The dungeon is quite small, it is essentially a box of $(l:blocks/stone)cobblestone$() and mossy cobblestone, with a $(l:blocks/spawner)spawner$() at its center. At the edges, a few $(l:blocks/chest)chests$() full of loot await the adventurer.
